QuestionStem: Which statement describes the relationship between memory and learning? Select all that apply.

options.AnswerText: A. An animal returns to an area where it found food in the past.
B. An animal defends itself against a predator.
C. An animal responds to hunger by foraging.
D. An animal avoids a confrontation with a painful prey.

CorrectFeedback: Memory plays a role in learning. Animals can use memory from a previous experience to improve their response to a stimulus.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Think about some learned behaviors and how memory might relate to them.
IncorrectFeedback: Think about some learned behaviors and how memory might relate to them.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: Memory plays a role in learning. Animals can use memory from a previous experience to improve their response to a stimulus.
